step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder blades are moving well, but try to bring them back and down a bit more smoothly. Focus on the circular motion.
Good job on the circular motion! For the next reps, try to really squeeze your shoulder blades together as you roll them back and down.
You're doing great with the shoulder rolls! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to breathe deeply as you move.
